features.backgroundFeatures:
--- Crimial Contact ---
You have a reliable and trustworthy contact who acts as your liaison to a network of other criminals. You know how to get messages to and from your contact, even over great distances; specifically, you know the local messengers, corrupt caravan masters, and seedy sailors who can deliver messages for you.
Ciminal Specialty: hired killer
features.classFeatures:
--- Expertise ---
Thieves' tools

--- Sneak Attack ---
10d6

--- Thieves' Cant ---

--- Cunning Action ---
Dash, Disengage, Hide

--- Uncanny Dodge ---
Reaction to halve the damage from one attack

--- Evasion ---
Half damage on failed DEX save, no damage on a success

--- Reliable Talent ---
Whenever you make an ability check that lets you add your proficiency bonus, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

--- Blindsense ---
You are aware of the location of any hidden or invisible creature with 10 feet of you.

--- Slippery Mind ---
You gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws

--- Elusive ---
No attack roll has advantage against you while you aren't incapcitated.

--- Stroke of Luck ---
If your attack misses a target within range, you can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if you fail an ability check, you can treat the d20 roll as a 20
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest

--- Assassinate ---
Advantage on attacks against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet in combat
Any hit on a surprised creature is a critical hit

--- Infiltration Expertise
7 days and 25 GP to establish a false identity which can be adopted as a disguise any time after
Creatures believe you to be that person until given an obvious reason not to

--- Imposter ---
After spending at least three hours listening to a person's speech, examining handwritting, and observing mannerisms you can impersonate them
Iindiscernible to the casual obersver
If a wary creature suspects something is amiss, you have advantage on any Charisma (deception) checks you make to avoid detection

--- Death Strike ---
When you attack and hit a creature that is surprised, it must make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + DEX mod + your proficiency bonus). On a failed save, double the damage of your attack against the creature.
features.otherFeatures:
--- Languages ---
Common
Infernal
Ignan

--- Tool Proficiencies ---
Thieves' tools
Disguise kit
Poisoners kit
features.raceFeatures:
--- Darkvision ---
60 ft.

--- Hellish Resistance ---
You have resistance to fire damage

--- Legacy of Dis ---
You know the thaumaturgy cantrip
You can cast disguise self once per long rest
You can cast detect thoughts once per long rest
